oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Envelope for deposition of plaintiff
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Envelope addressed to Circuit Court Clerk of Roane County which includes depositions in the case of Plaintiff, James B. Cross vs. G.W. McKenzie et al. The envelope indicates it included the depositions of Valentine Roberts, Wesley Massey, Mary M. Rowden, Mary Lacy. Clerk W. J. Patton wrote that the envelope was received and opened by him on June 11, 1866. The postmaster hand wrote the postage of nine cents on the upper right corner. The reverse of the envelope includes original wax seals.
